General.Name: Shanghai Emperor of Cleaning Hi-Tech Co Ltd
General.Description: Shanghai Emperor of Cleaning Hi-Tech Co., Ltd provides water treatment and air duct cleaning services in China. The company offers online intelligent air disinfection services for closed spaces and limited spaces; double carbon emission reduction services; and urban river management services. It also offers municipal construction and material supply services; subcontracting services; hazardous waste disposal services; and environmental protection equipment, testing, and BOO engineering services, etc. The company serves various industries, such as iron and steel, metallurgy, petroleum and petrochemical, pulp and paper, automobile manufacturing, electronic appliances, energy, materials, information, and other industries. Shanghai Emperor of Cleaning Hi-Tech Co., Ltd was founded in 1994 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: Block B, Baishu Building, Shanghai, China, 200437
